definition: stagnation of 氣|气[qi4] (TCM)
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Much attention must be paid in clinic to the cancerization trend of gastric disease with Spleen deficiency syndrome.

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the quantitative diagnosis of stagnation of Qi and blood stasis syndrome in chronic prostatitis.

sentences.english: For the elderly patients with the normal outcome of abnormal coronary angiography, Qi-stagnation syndrome is more.
sentences.chinese: 冠脉造影结果正常的患者气滞证比较多见。

definition: (in Chinese medicine) stasis (of blood or other fluids)

hematoma (internal blood clot)/extravasated blood (spilt into surrounding tissue)/contusion
clotted blood/extravasated blood (leaking into surrounding tissue)/thrombosis

loose bowels/diarrhea/to have the runs
diarrhea

chest and hypochondrium/upper part of the body

latent (desire, feeling etc)/bottled up
